author: Reuters
description: Canadian home prices accelerated again in May from the previous month, posting the largest monthly rise in the history of the Teranet-National Bank Composite House Price Index, data showed on Thursday.
title: Canadian home price gains accelerate again in May -Teranet - Reuters
